mapper.select: SELECT c.f_id, c.f_type, c.f_struct_number, c.f_color, c.f_volume, c.f_weight, c.f_date, c.f_turbo, c.f_drive, c.f_min_price, c.f_part, c.f_insure, c.f_other, c.f_care_counts FROM t_cheliang c WHERE c.f_struct_number = #{FStructNumber} GROUP BY c.f_id, c.f_type, c.f_struct_number, c.f_color, c.f_volume, c.f_weight, c.f_date, c.f_turbo, c.f_drive, c.f_min_price, c.f_part, c.f_insure, c.f_other, c.f_care_counts
